#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

ElectricSleep is reliant on several other open-source projects and snippets of code. This wiki page will be used to help document these depencies and give credit where credit is due.


= Libraries =

*AChartEngine* http://www.achartengine.org/ 0.5.0 used for logging sleep movement data

= Borrowed Code or Concepts = 

*Smart Alarm Clock*  http://www.smart-alarm-clock.com/ Inspiration for project, seems to be defunct, and doesn't work reliably on latest versions of Android.
